attributes.action: Refuse the planning application for a new coal fired power station at kingsnorth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
on the following grounds...
1)It will cause further damage to the Global Climate due to its carbon footprint.
2)It will further damage the local environment due to its emmissions both gaseous and particulate.
3)It will damage Britains chances of meeting its promised CO2 emmissions target.
4)It will send a counter productive message to the international community with regard the importance of reducing emmissions.
5)It will send a counter productive message to individuals , who are being asked to curb their own emmissions.
6)Take up of this "old" technology would retard development ; innovation and investment into clean future generation technology.
